description: You can find more about this talk on `djangocon.eu <https://2016.djangocon.eu/speakers/21>`_. This video is hosted by `opbeat.com <http://opbeat.com/community/posts/introducing-django-to-the-foreign-world-by-bashar-al-abdulhadi/>`_. The talk speaks about how to introduce Arabic to the web and the use of Arabish (English+Arabic) which is transletiration of text.
title: Introducing Django To The Foreign World
